reviews.comments: Todo muy bien respecto al anfitrión, inclusive nosotros llegamos tarde en la noche al departamento y ella nos estaba esperando con las llaves. Lo único malo, un detalle nada mas, es que el segundo piso es muy caluroso. El resto impecable y tal cual se ve en las fotos.

Muy hermosa nuestra estadía en la casa de Mercedes. Disfrutamos a cada momento ese espacio amplio, de muy buen gusto, luminoso y con todas las comodidades. La ubicación en el barrio tranquilo, la posibilidad de conexión con otras zonas de Buenos Aires hacen de este departamento un sitio perfecto para disfrutar unos días en la capital. Fuertemente recomendado!!!
Sin duda cuando se de otra oportunidad volveremos.
Gracias por todo!

LA PROPIEDAD ESTA CORRECTA . SE MUESTRA TAL CUAL ES EN LA FOTOS ,
ANTES DE VIAJAR PREGUNTE A MERCEDES SI EL DEPARTAMENTO TENIA CALEFACCIÓN , Y ME DIJO QUE SOLO 1 RADIADOR , ASÍ QUE LE AVISE QUE LLEVARIA 2 CALOVENTORES MIOS . LA PRIMER NOCHE SUFRIMOS UN CORTE DE LUZ , DEBIDO A LA MALA INSTALACIÓN ELECTRICA , QUE NO RESISTIÓ . EL PROBLEMA FUE RESUELTO , PERO POR MIEDO , NO ENCENDIMOS NUEVAMENTE LOS ARTEFACTOS Y PASAMOS FRÍO. 
CREO QUE LA VIVIENDA NO ESTÁ DEL TODO PREPARADA PARA EL INVIERNO . TODO EL RESTO , OK

El departamento es tal y como se muestra en el aviso. Amplio, cómodo y muy luminoso. En un barrio tranquilo y residencial, pero a pocas cuadras de zona de restaurantes y bares. Está bien conectado y percibimos la zona como segura. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente y Mercedes se mostró comunicativa, atenta y flexible al momento de coordinar el check-in y check-out. Lo recomiendo 100%.
La casa tine muy buen gusto y Mercedes está a disposición. Hermosa energía y espacio para pasar unos días de amor en Buenos Aires

Mercedes siempre tuve excelente comunicación con nosotros tanto para recibirnos como durante la estadía. El departamento era muy cómodo, lindo, limpio y con mucha luz. La ubicación es muy buena y la estadía se disfruta mucho con las comodidades de la casa. Sin duda vamos a volver a este departamento además Mercedes fue muy amable y estuvo en todos los detalles!

Nos sentimos como en casa, muy cómodo el dpto. Y es tal y como se ve en las fotos.  No tuvimos ningún inconveniente y Mercedes respondió atentamente a todas nuestras consultas.  La zona es ruidosa ya que se encuentra cerca de las vías del tren y la calle es transitada, pero después de los intensos de actividad que tuvimos dormimos tranquilos. El auto lo dejamos en la calle,  abajo del dpto. Sin problemas. En conclusión altamente recomendable. Gracias Mercedes, un gusto haber estado en tu casa.

nuestra estadía fue muy placentera. Mercedes no estaba en Bs As, pero en su lugar la reemplazó su amigo Martin quien nos recibió amigablemente y nos facilitó todo lo que estuvo a su alcance. El departamento es muy cómodo y su decoración preciosa. Gracias Martin!

Mercedes fue super atenta con nosotros, la casa es hermosa, super limpia y acorde a lo descripto.
Super recomendado para jovenes que quieran estar cerca del movimiento nocturno, no así para personas mayores ya que tiene muchas escaleras.
Muy buen lugar para quedarse.

Mercedes es muy amable el duplex es muy cómodo y tiene un entorno muy verde, a pocas cuadras hay una cochera y también se puede estacionar en la calle, esta a pocas cuadras del barrio de palermo, 100% recomendado!

Estuvimos muy cómodos en el dúplex de Mercedes. El lugar es muy conveniente, hay toda clase de comercios cerca, y por las noches fue tranquilo. La terraza con parrilla es un lujo en Capital Federal, y... ¡la usamos dos veces en 3 dias! 

El departamento es amplio, muy bien decorado y luminoso. ¡Muy recomendable!
Lindo departamento, amplio y con una terraza muy acogedora.
Muy buen lugar. Increíble ubicación.
Gracias!
Excelente hospedaje con muy buena atención de Mercedes.

Mercedes: Genial, atenta, siempre dispuesta a ayudar y muy distendida, una anfitriona de lujo!
El Depa: Muy cómodo, central, con buses a la mano que te llevan a Palermo (que esta al lado), Recoleta, el Centro y la Boca. Mucho comercio alrededor, ademas de restaurantes y bares. La terraza espectacular con una parrilla que fue muy bien utilizada, en conclusión, si van a Buenos Aires, el alojamiento de Mercedes es una alternativa muy buena.
Nuestra estadía fue sensacional, el apartamento es muy limpio, cómodo y bien ubicado y Mercedes es una host fantástica, servicial y muy atenta
Nuestra estadía fue sensacional, el apartamento es muy limpio, cómodo y bien ubicado y Mercedes es una host fantástica, servicial y muy atenta

Comenzando con los aspectos positivos, el departamento de Mercedes es muy bonito, bien decorado y completo. Además se encuentra en un barrio tradicional, de fácil acceso (cerca del subte) y cerca de lindos restaurantes del barrio Palermo. Especialmente recomendamos el café Le Ble, cerca del subte.
A pesar lo anterior tuvimos un inconveniente importante, un persistente olor a gas, que aunque fue avisado, la propietaria no tomó medidas para arreglar el problema.
Mercedes sí fue flexible en traer otro medio de calefacción, esta vez eléctrico. Pero creemos que el olor a gas tiene su origen en un desperfecto de conexión al servicio, pues se mantuvo aún a pesar de que cortamos las llaves de paso.
Otra desventaja puede ser el ruido de los autobuses urbanos que circulan por la calle delante del departamento durante día y noche, especialmente para los de sueño ligero.
Buenos dias .. La casa estupenda en una zona muy bien conectada.. Mercedes muy buena persona .. Te ayuda en lo que necesitas...
Mercedes fue muy simpática y el apartamento es hermoso en un barrio genial! Todo fue perfecto y muy fácil.

Mercedes nos estaba esperando a llegar del aeropuerto
Nos dio varios datos para visitar la ciudad
El loft en si a parte de ser muy lindo es muy cómodo y espacioso 
Tiene todas las comodidades
Recomiendo 100% la casa de mercedes para cualquier estadía en Buenos Aires
Recomendable lugar por su ubicación y disposición de los anfitriones . Excelente equilibrio costo y beneficio . Ideal para familia.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias por tus comentarios !! Ha sido un placer tenerlos de huéspedes !

reviews.comments:
Mercedes nos recibio en la hora acordada y con cordialidad. es confiable y agradable, y en todo momento el trato fue personal y de confianza. El dpto esta de acuerdo a lo descripto...terraza con parrilla really value for money...
La ubicación es muy buena cercana a restaurantes, boliches, bares de Palermo...pero tranquilo. A pocos metros de la para de colectivos hacia el centro... en general excelente

Wow! I am very pleased with my time in the apartment! The pictures online don't do this place justice. It is so beautiful and the neighborhood around it is very safe! Mercedes is a wonderful host! The kitchen is fully stocked with cooking utensils, plates, bowls, cups, etc. I would definitely stay here again! :) (if i could give more stars I would)
Superbe appartement très bien situé , très lumineux avec ces nombreuse terrasses. Où l’on peut avoir chaud l’été.

O espaço da Mercedes é muito grande e estiloso. A parte de cima é feito de um material de metal, que no verão esquenta muito, mas basta você abrir o espaço que dá uma refrescada. Aluguei uma casa em Punta e em seguida fui para a casa da Mercedes, então ficou difícil não comparar. Nada que atrapalhe, mas devia ter mais eletrodomésticos como liquidificador, sanduicheira, enfim, algumas facilidades a mais, mas só sentimos porque tivemos um amigo que se acidentou e o casal ficou a viagem toda no apartamento. Na frente tem o café La Noire que é perfeito, o donos são fofos demais e a comida é orgânica e incrível. Descendo a rua tem uma estação de metrô. O local é bem tranquilo. Infelizmente não conhecemos Mercedes, mas o Pablo nos recepcionou muito bem. Enfim, super recomendo o ap.

O duplex é lindo, a decoração deixa ele bem aconchegante. A localização é boa, fica a 10min andando do metro e a vizinhança é calma. Mercedes estava viajando enquanto estive lá, mas deixou um amigo dela pra nos receber e ele foi a simpatia em pessoa e muito solicito, nos deu diversas dicas de como nos locomover, onde comer e respondia em prontidão sempre que precisávamos. As camas são maravilhosas, bem confortáveis, o único problema da minha estadia com minha família foi o fato de ter apenas um ar condicionado, que fica em um dos quartos no andar de cima, os outros comodos sofrem muito com o calor, fica quase insuportável. O wifi é bem instável, não pega no andar de cima.
Really beautiful apartment at a nice place. Also nice parilla on the terrace, just awesome! I can recommend it very well!

Mercedes’ place was perfect! Its a duplex and spacious. Good location. We also had very good communication. I would definitely stay there again.
Thanks Mercedes
Lovely. Mercedes was super helpful. The house is easy and clean. It is in a great part of town which makes it accessible to all restaurants. Nothing bad to say.
Beautiful place with lots of space and  great views. Loved it.

Die Wohnung ist sehr genau wie beschrieben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und die Kommunikation war sehr schnell - aber nur auf Spanisch. Als wir Probleme mit dem Schloss hatten, hatte sich Juan sehr schnell gekümmert und innerhalb von Stunden das Schloss ausgetauscht. Mercedes haben wir persönlich nicht getroffen, aber die Kommunikation über (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) war sehr schnell und nett. Die große Terrasse ist natürlich ein Highlight, aber durch die vielen Fenster ist die Wohnung sehr warm im Sommer und um mit offenem Fenster zu schlafen ist es vielleicht manchen zu laut. Das sind aber persönliche Präferenzen. In der Wohnung ist alles vorhanden, was man braucht und genug Platz für vier Personen.

Appartement bien entretenu (très propres, sans odeurs) et bien situé (nombreux commerces à proximité). Métro et bus dans les environs immédiat. Mercedes nous a conseillé et aidé durant notre séjour. Seul bémol, en plein été la climatisation n’est disponible quand dans une chambre. Mais un bon courant d’air a permis de rafraîchir l’étage. N’hésitez pas à loger dans ce bel appartement avec sa superbe terrasse.

Good place for a fair price and in a nice neighborhood. Though a little noisy and warm in summer. One concern was that the balcony doors could not be locked. Did not feel safe when we left the place, but lickily nothing happened. Also, the one evening that we used the (very nice) terrace for a drink and played some music, we were told that we should keep it down (on a Saturday evening). That was a bit of a downer.
Great location within walking distance to a small grocery store and laundromat. Also close to a few popular parrillas and other restaurants. Mercedes also responded to a lot our questions promptly.

Mercedes’ place was amazing.  Beautiful massive windows. Three decks.  She was very responsive (even in the middle of the night when we couldn’t figure out the key!). Thoughtful touches: a beer in the fridge, first aid kit, international power adapters, etc.  

It felt like we were living in a real Portenos’ apartment.  

I loved the area.  Very funky and lots of great coffee shops and restaurants.  

I would love to stay there again!
Mercedes was he perfect host! She was so accommodating sweet and we would truly plan coming back to stay at her place

Returning customer here. As always, Mercedes’ place is one of the best appartment in Buenos Aires. Plenty of space, clean and very well iluminated. Its terraza with parilla is somehting that you won’t forget! Mercedes’ appartment makes my trips feel like home. If you like to feel Buenos Aires stilish place, this is the place.

L'appartement de Mercedes est extrêmement propre sans odeur sur les oreillers. La terrasse est un atout majeur si vous souhaitez faire des grillades. En ce qui concerne la localisation nous avons choisi cet appartement par rapport au marché au puces. 
Mercedes est extrêmement flexible sur les horaires ce qui signifie qu'elle est attentive aux problèmes de ses hôtes et ne fait pas du Airbnb que pour l'argent. 
En revanche, si je devais y avoir une remarque négative: l'appartement est à l'aplomb d'un carrefour fréquenté.... 
Dernière remarque le prix est tout à fait en accord avec la proposition.
Ótima pedida pra se sentir como um local em Buenos Aires.

A casa está como descrito nas fotos, bem equipada, e com boa localização, numa região bem servida de transporte. Mercedes foi uma ótima anfitriã, muito atenciosa, respondendo às dúvidas e dando indicações necessárias.

Good spacious apartment, really helps having 2 toilets, very clean and we really loved the terrace.  Comfortable beds, well equipped kitchen.  Traffic a bit noisey at times but close to subway and great for a family.  Two stories up so a few stairs to get there but worth it when you do!

Experiência muito positiva. Destaque para a limpeza! Localização boa, perto de restaurantes, bares e vida noturna em Palermo.
Acomodações confortáveis e ambiente agradável.

L appartement de Mercedes est super agréable car très lumineux, joli, grand et bien placé pour aller à pied à Palermo, en bus partout dans la ville ou en métro ligne A
Mercedes est très sympa et tout était facile pour s organiser avec elle.
Cet airbnb est top!

L'appartement est agréable et lumineux, nous y avons logé avec nos 2 plus jeunes filles et c'était très confortable, la vue est merveilleuse, la terrasse géniale ! L'emplacement était encore plus idéal que ce que j'espérais, très simple avec le bus 93 qui s'arrête dans la rue et tous les autres dans les rues voisines, de partir à la découverte de la ville et au-delà, un bus à Villa Crespo (quartier juste à une rue) conduit jusqu'à la feria de matederos, à faire le dimanche ! Le métro est également proche et c'est la ligne qui permet de rejoindre le centre, plaza de mayo etc. Dans les environs proches il y a d'excellentes adresses pour se régaler, les pizzas Angelin (c'est une tuerie), la Rua Express avec ses succulentes pâtes, empenadas et sa bonne bière artisanale, un café bobo chic "La Noire"  a ouvert juste en face de l'immeuble quand nous y étions et plusieurs boulangeries sont installées dans le quartier avec  des montagnes de viennoiseries et grosses "tortas" fondantes. Mercedes est très chouette, tout est simple et clair, facile !  Je reviendrai à Buenos Aires, ville si énergisante et j'espère à nouveau vivre dans cet appartement !
Ótimo apartamento, muito bem equipado e localizado. As fotos fazem jus ao local. Excelente escolha!

Mercedes was lovely and very amenable to our check in and check out time. The neighborhood was quiet for walking around yet still close to plenty of places to grab food, beers, coffee, groceries, or whatever you need. Great place to stay!

Passei 3 noites no apartamento que é exatamente como nas fotos, ótima localização, transporte, mercado, bares, baladas tudo andando apenas algumas quadras. A única coisa que deixa um pouco a desejar é realmente o sinal de wi fi, ele não pega em todos os cômodos. De resto foi tudo uma maravilha, Mercedes muito atenciosa, casa muito (URL HIDDEN) certeza eu voltaria e indicaria sem medo para amigos e familiares.

Mercedes' apartment is fantastic. Close to all the best bars and restaurants and walking distance to the Subte. The rooftop area is great for an afternoon wine, while you're waiting for the Argentinians to catch up and head out for the night. It's the perfect base for your Buenos Aires experience.

O espaço é exatamente como nas fotos, amplo e muito limpo! É próximo de estações de metro e ponto de ônibus, o que torna fácil a locomoção.
A Mercedes foi muito atenciosa desde a reserva do imóvel até o dia do check-out. Voltaria tranquilamente. Super recomendo!
Muito agradável e espaçoso, com toda a comodidade. Possui uma varanda pra uso privado do apartamento. Se você viaja com crianças, acho especialmente bom.

The apartment was just as pictured and very comfortable for 3 adults. There are restaurants/bars within walking distance but we did need to take a taxi to most places we wanted to go to, but worth it for this spacious and beautiful apartment.
Apartamento muito aconchegante, bem localizado, próximo a uma estação de metrô, tem um mercadinho a um quarteirão de distancia. O apartamento é super confortável. Adoramos a estadia!
Muito aconchegante, moderno e funcional. Bem cool
Photos are 100% accurate, the place is big and with a lot of light. Mercedes was an excellent host and I definitely recommend her place to the Airbnb community :)
Tudo perfeito. Super atenciosa, bem localizado e as fotos condiz com o lugar. Sem duvidas quando voltar a Buenos Aires, ficarei nesta casa.
Great airbnb!

アルゼンチンに着いたのが8:30pmと遅い時間に関わらず嫌な顔もせずメルセデスさんは待っていてくれました!お部屋は広々としていて掃除も行き届いていてとっても素敵!うちには小さい子供は居ないので問題は無かったが小さいお子さん連れには向かないかも。場所的には夜でも近くのコンビニへ歩いて行っても平気な位安全でした。私達は3日しか泊まらかったので、キッチンの物は殆ど使わなかったが、色々揃って居たように思われます。
Sehr gut und sauber! Tolle Nachbarschaft mit Bars und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten
Nice situated apt. Clean and quiet. Mercedes made our 10 days in BA comfortable. Thx again

This is one of the best apartments across different portals I've seen in a long time. Both the apartment itself including facilities and the area surrounding the apartment are worth a stay - a pity we could stay for six days only. 

Strongly recommended, especially as Mercedes is a super friendly and welcoming host!

Our accommodation was unique and spacious, a short walk and you are amongst lots of restaurants and bars, as well as a supermarket to buy supplies! My room had AC which was a pleasant surprise.  Mercede was kind to let us check out later as we had a late flight. Thanks so much!

This is a beautiful and clean apartment in a nice part of Buenos Aires. You find everything you need in the kitchen/livingroom area. Big terrasse with furniture. You can walk around to the parts of Palermo with bars and restaurants, also Metro (Subte) station is close. We had a great time!
Um local muito agradável para se hospedar. Estávamos em 4 pessoas e o espaço em comum proporcionou uma ótima convivência. Gostamos muito.

Mercedes' home is beautiful in a growing neighborhood west of Palermo Hollywood. We walked to dinners and bars each night and were able to get a good feel for the entire Palermo neighborhood. I would highly recommend coming in spring or fall, when the weather is cooler. There is AC in one of the rooms on the second floor, but the weather was oppressive and made for a tough sleeping environment.
L'appartement est identique au photo. Il est spacieux et confortable. Il est aussi près des transports en commun, ce que nous avons apprécié. La terrasse privée est un très bel atout.

We had a great stay at the duplex !! It was clean, spacious and definitely felt like home. Mercedes was a wonderful host that cared greatly to reach out to us and make sure we were well antiquated with the area and the apartment. We would recommend this apartment to anyone!

A beautiful home in one of BA's best neighbourhoods. Two minor issues: wifi doesn't work in parts of the apartment and it's a tough place to be during a hot BA Summer day as there's only AC in one bedroom. This being said, it's a very unique and lovely place to stay!
Your own private roof terrace in the middle of Buenos Aires !

Gostamos muito do apartamento e da disponibilidade da Mercedes e do Juan.

Apartamento limpo, novo, com bons banheiros. Sala ampla e arejada, assim como os quartos.

Falta só um ar condicionado em um dos quartos, que pelo o que disseram, já está sendo providenciado.

Camas confortáveis, mas muito macias, na minha opinião. Bom para quem gosta. Eu prefiro colchões mais firmes.

O wifi é instável na parte de cima do apartamento.

Mesmo com alguns pontos "negativos", gostamos muito, recomendamos e voltaremos, se possível.

Excellent séjour, juan et mercedes sont des hôtes très accueillants et très sympathiques. L'appartement est fidèle à la description, bien situé, proche de nombreux commerces, de la calle honduras et à 10 minutes du métro. Excellent !

Mercede's place is excellent. On a walking distance, you'll find bars, restaurants, night clubs and the Dorrego Station (subway). During our stay, she kept in contact and made everything easier. The photos describe perfectly her space, which is big and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again. Strongly recommended.

Perfecto! The house as exactly as pictured and well maintained. Mercedes was so kind that she even rushed to clean everything when our flight arrived a bit early. Highly recommend for anyone coming to Buenos Aires!

Mercedes welcomed us very warmly and explained to us all we needed to know to enjoy our stay. She was also available several times during our trip to answer our questions regarding the city but also other practical matters. Overall  the apartment is charming, exactly like it appears on pictures, it is cozy, decorated with taste and very functional. The only little thing that perhaps was a bit disappointing was the bedroom's isolation. We had a couple of very windy and rainy nights and the room was very noisy. Otherwise, go for it, the place is awesome, it will definitely be a plus to your trip.
Very bright , comtemporary with pretty terrace. Spotless and well equiped. Good outdoor space.
房子位置不错,周边很安静,适合居住。房子很漂亮,和图片一样的,是这次旅行里面最期待的住宿了。果然没让我们失望!房主很热情,细心的给我们介绍周边情况及信息。

Great flat, very spacious and bright, super clean and well furnished! Nice location in Palermo, not so far away from the metro, and many cafes and restaurants around! Super smooth checkin and checkout with Mercedes makes the whole stay perfect! Internet is super fast too. Only thing is, in the bedrooms upstairs you can hear the street quite well, especially during the week. Wonderful place overall!

Merecedes was an excellent host! Very friendly & helpful. 
The apartment is beautiful & spacious, although it is a 10 block walk to the heart of Palermo, but it had great cafes & a supermarket nearly by.

This apartment is amazing! Only few blocks from Palermo Soho, restaurants and bars. This apartment has everything that you need for your vacation in Buenos Aires. Plenty of space and amazing view of barrio Palermo. One of the few apartments with your own terraza with Parilla (BBQ Grill), as you can see in the pictures. I definitely will come back, this is the place to stay! If you need info on how to move in the city, Mercedes is one of the best host that I ever met, always available for anything that you may need. 

Mercedes, thank you!!! for your warm welcome and I'm planning my next trip! See you soon. Javier Guandalini

The place was very spacious, clean, and well-furnished. Communication with Mercedes was great and she was very accommodating. The best part about this apartment is the location. Within a 10-minute walking distance you'll get to great restaurants and bars. The subway is also about 10 minutes away. The neighborhood was very nice and always felt safe. There are security guards standing at every other corner at night time and you'll often see people walk their dogs around the neighborhood past midnight. It never felt unsafe. Overall, it was a great experience. I would definitely stay here again.
Mercedes is a great host and the house is amazing, huge, clean, well located and with a great terrace.

Mercedes and her apartment are the best! It's a cozy, treehouse-like bedroom with ample space on two floors and huge terrace. The apt is walking distance to great restaurants and transportation. Mercedes is incredibly responsive and on top of it if you need anything. Can't recommend it enough!
O duplex de Mercedes é muito charmoso, aconchegante, de bom gosto e bem localizado. Uma delícia para quem quer conhecer Bs As.
ottima esperienza! Host super disponibili e gentili!

Gostamos muito do apartamento, recomendamos! Tudo que estava descrito no anúncio correspondia a realidade. Fomos muito bem recebidos por Martin, que nos auxiliou em tudo que foi necessário. 0 apartamento correspondeu a todas as nossas expectativas, o bairro é muito charmoso e seguro, deixamos nosso Carro em frente ao prédio sem qualquer problema. Obrigado Mercedes! Grande abraço

Apt was just as listed --spacious and open --plenty of room. Easy to get around Buenos Aires from this neighborhood. Close to markets, subway and buses.
Host was responsive and helpful-would highly recommend!

This is a very, very cool flat, in a very, very cool area of Buenos Aires, 5mn by foot from lots of cafés and restaurants in Palermo! Everything worked out well: the furniture is nice and functional, the terrace is very big, Mercedes was friendly and arranged an early check in for us. Not a single bad point to be said!

We loved the apartment , was sunny and well heated for winter , very clean and new . Can't wait to see what they will do with the terrace...  so we can return for summer ( I am sure they are working on it )
_ suggestions :
better quality bath towels
better lamps in bedrooms 
a set of new dinning  chairs 
other wise all very good  even close enough to Palermo Soho only 10 blocks ,
Mercedes foi muito atenciosa durante a estadia. O aparmento é otimo,muito amplo e muito bem localizado, ainda mais bonito que nas fotos. Recomendo com certeza!
The place is amazing! Great location, and beautiful apartment. Mercedes was a really great host as well, thank you very much for a wonderful stay!

Mercedes was a great host, very responsive and flexible with check-in and check-out. The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood, it's quite big and full of light. I had a nice stay there and would definitely recommend it.
O bairro maravilhoso!!! Tudo maravilhoso, Mercedes muito simpática e atenciosa.
Mercedes nos recebeu muito bem, a casa é muito aconchegante e de fácil acesso, com toda a certeza se tiver oportunidade voltarei. Obrigada pela recepção.

Eine der schönsten Wohnungen, die ich jemals auf Airbnb ergattern haben konnte. Super Lage in der Nähe einer Metro Station und zu Fuß ist man schnell in Palermo und Hollywood mit den vielen Bars und Restaurants. Mercedes und ihr Ehemann waren außerordentlich kommunikativ und hilfsbereit.
The apartment was wonderful -- bright and clean. Had everything we needed for our stay.
reviews.response: Gretchen thank you very much! It was a pleasure to have you!

reviews.comments: This is the one of the most remarkable experiences i had in airbnb. The apartment is cozy, spacious, luminous and the terrace is amazing.  I will definitely come back.

Our host Mercedes was excellent, so warm and helpful and made us feel immediately at home. The loft was spacious, had good lighting and all the kitchen amenities were adequate.  The terrace was a special treat and even the bedroom upstairs had lots of space to sit outside.  The flat was clean and super comfortable. Thank you Mercedes.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Daniel!! Espero verlos nuevamente! Besos

reviews.comments:
Nous avons été très bien reçu par Mercedes qui a accepté de nous recevoir plus tôt que prévu.
L appartement est fidèle aux photos.
La décoration est recherchée .
La terrasse est immense est magnifique.
Les lits sont superers confortables.
Le logement est proche de Palermo Soho et de Palermo Holywood.
Nous y retournerions avec plaisir.
Ville superbe.

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Mercedes, qui nous as aidés à bien nous installer- Chaleureuse et flexible, toujours à l'écoute de nos besoins. L'équipement de la cuisine peut être amélioré, tout le reste est super.
